name: Ramius
overview: Ramius, LLC is a privately owned investment manager. The firm provides its services to endowments and foundations, pension funds, commercial banks, investment banks, insurance companies, private banks, regional banks, family offices and high net worth individuals. It manages hedge funds for its clients. The firm invests in the alternative investment markets. It employs top-down approach for capital allocation along with bottom-up approach to make its investments. The firm also employs a broad range of hedge fund strategies including, hedged equity, convertible arbitrage/capital structure arbitrage, fixed income arbitrage, credit based, event driven, opportunistic equity, global macro and managed futures. Ramius was founded in 1994 and is based in New York, New York. The firm operates as a subsidiary of Cowen Group, Inc.
